name: DAYVIGO
contraindications: Recommended dose is 5 mg taken no more than once per night, immediately before going to bed, with at least 7 hours remaining before the planned time of awakening. Dosage may be increased to 10 mg based on clinical response and tolerability. ( 2.1 ) The maximum recommended dose is 10 mg once daily. ( 2.1 ) Time to sleep onset may be delayed if taken with or soon after a meal. ( 2.1 ) Hepatic Impairment: ( 2.3 ) ○ Moderate hepatic impairment: Initial and maximum recommended dosage is 5 mg no more than once per night. ○ Severe hepatic impairment: Not recommended.
warningsAndPrecautions:
DAYVIGO tablets are available as:
                        
                           5 mg, pale yellow, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets, and debossed with "5" on one side and "LЄM" on the other side. 
                        
                        NDC 62856-405-30, bottle of 30 with child-resistant closure
                        NDC 62856-405-90, bottle of 90 with child-resistant closure
                        
                           10 mg, orange, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets, and debossed with "10" on one side and "LЄM" on the other side.
                        
                        NDC 62856-410-30, bottle of 30 with child-resistant closure
                        NDC 62856-410-90, bottle of 90 with child-resistant closure
adverseReactions: DAYVIGO is contraindicated in patients with narcolepsy.
